edu.luc.cs.trull.task
Class AbstractTaskWorker

java.lang.Object
  edu.luc.cs.trull.EmptyComponent
      edu.luc.cs.trull.TerminatingComponent
          edu.luc.cs.trull.task.AbstractTaskWorker
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component, java.util.EventListener, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, PropertyChangeSource, SchedulerAware, Startable, Suspendable, Terminating
Direct Known Subclasses:
PooledTaskWorker, QueuedTaskWorker
abstract class AbstractTaskWorker
extends TerminatingComponent

A Worker for the step-by-step execution of a Task using an Executor.

See Also:
Task, TaskFactory
